attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need a third road off canvey.  On Friday they shut Canvey Way and it took over 2 hours just to reach the station from my house which is near the town.   How can you even think a 3rd road is not important.

rejection.details: Please make your title a request for action rather than a name/statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
